product_name: Pearl Izumi ELITE Pursuit Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: Great for warm weather rides, the Pearl Izumi ELITE Pursuit bike jersey helps keep you cool and dry when you're putting in miles under the sun. ELITE Transfer stretch fabric transfers moisture to the outer surface for fast evaporation and all-day comfort; In-R-Cool technology helps reduce overheating. Ventilation panels help keep you cool and comfortable. Full-length front zipper lets you ventilate as needed. Droptail hem with gripper holds jersey in place. Rear pockets stow your ride essentials. Reflective elements help boost your visibility. Formfitting cut of the Pearl Izumi ELITE Pursuit bike jersey helps reduce wind drag.
